mapper.insert: insert into tb_label(id, label_name, state, count, fans, recommend, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values(#{id}, #{labelName}, #{state}, #{count}, #{fans}, #{recommend}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select id, label_name as labelName, state, count, fans, recommend, create_by as createBy, create_time as createTime, update_by as updateBy, update_time as updateTime from tb_label tl where tl.state = '1'

select t.id, t.label_name as labelName, t.state, t.count, t.fans, t.recommend, t.create_by as createBy, t.create_time as createTime, t.update_by as updateBy, t.update_time as updateTime from tb_label t where t.state = '1' and t.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update tb_label t
t.label_name = #{labelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t.fans = #{fans,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t.recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
